root.name: The Clockwork Man: The Hidden World
root.description: OverviewGo for the second time on a steam-powered journey through land, air, and water in this Hidden Object Adventure from Total Eclipse.This time Miranda and Sprocket, the Clockwork Man who gives you hints, set out to discover The Hidden World, a land lost in time and glimpsed through legends. As in the previous game, The Clockwork Man, you have to puzzle your way through logic puzzles and find a lot of hidden objects to progress in your adventure.PC System RequirementsOS: Windows XP/Vista/7Processor: 2.0 GHz or betterMemory: 1024 MB or moreHard Disk Space: 260 MBVideo Card: DirectX 8.0 compatible video card or higherDirectXÂ®: 8.0Mac System RequirementsOS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8, Snow Leopard 10.6.3, or later.Processor: 2.0 GHz or betterMemory: 1024 MB or moreHard Disk Space: 270 MB
